mapper.sql: SELECT PRN_SN as prnSn , USER_NO as userNo , USER_NM as userNm , PRN_DOC as prnDoc , PARAM as param , PRN_DTTM as prnDttm FROM tb_log_prn_log WHERE 1 = 1
AND USER_NM like CONCAT('%', NVL((#{userNm}), USER_NM), '%') AND SUBSTR(PRN_DTTM,1,8) BETWEEN NVL((REPLACE(#{startDate},'.','') ), '19900101') AND NVL((REPLACE(#{endDate},'.','')),'99991231')
mapper.select:
/* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 출력물 로그 전체 목록을 조회한다. */
ORDER BY PRN_DTTM DESC

/* SQL ID : listPageing 설 명 : 출력물 로그의 페이징 목록을 조회한다. */
ORDER BY PRNDTTM DESC
